snippet: Thousands of Egypt's most fervent soccer fans gathered in the shadows of Cairo International Stadium on Sunday night to mark the end of the 40-day mourning period that began after the Port Said stadium disaster on Feb. 1.
abstract: Thousands of Egypt's most fervent soccer fans gathered in the shadows of Cairo International Stadium on Sunday night to mark the end of the 40-day mourning period that began after the Port Said stadium disaster on Feb. 1.

headline.main: In Egypt, Rival Ultras Meet to Show Common Cause
